connect.title: Connect to a wallet
connect.content: New user? Connect to a wallet to see your asset balances. Start trading in under 10 minutes.

completePassport.title: Get started in a few minutes.
completePassport.content: Complete your passport setup to enable your Swarm Markets account.

signIn.title: Get started in a few minutes.
signIn.content: To access your Passport or create a new one, sign in with your ethereum address.

transactionForbidden: This address is not able to transact

docScan.error: Sorry, something went wrong while scanning your documents

changeNetwork.title: Wrong network
changeNetwork.content: Connect your wallet to [MAINNET/POLYGON] to continue.
